name: Graphics.Shorthand
comment:
Some helpful shorthands for common graphics styles.

# Drawing styles
These drawing styles are all relative to a global drawing scale supplied as the first argument
@docs onePxLine, onePxOutlined, onePxTraced

values.name: onePxLine
values.comment: Shorthand for 'defaultLine' with a drawing scale and color

values.name: onePxOutlined
values.comment: Shorthand for 'outlined' with a drawing scale and color

values.name: onePxTraced
values.comment: Shorthand for 'traced' with a drawing scale and color
